chapter.title: Enhancements to the CDI Programming Model
chapter.para: Weld Extensions provides a number enhancements to the CDI programming model which are under trial and may be included in later releases of Contexts and Dependency Injection.

section.title: Preventing a class from being processed
@Veto
section.para: Annotating a class @Veto will cause the type to be ignored, such that any definitions on the type will not be processed, including:

itemizedlist.listitem: the managed bean, decorator, interceptor or session bean defined by the type
any producer methods or producer fields defined on the type
any observer methods defined on the type

note.para: The ProcessAnnotatedType container lifecycle event will be called for vetoed types.

section.title: @Requires
section.para: Annotating a class @Requires will cause the type to be ignored if the class dependencies can be satisfied. Any definitions on the type will not be processed:

itemizedlist.listitem: the managed bean, decorator, interceptor or session bean defined by the type
any producer methods or producer fields defined on the type
any observer methods defined on the type

tip.para: Weld will use the Thread Context ClassLoader, as well as the classloader of the type annotated @Requires to attempt to satisfy the class dependency.

note.para: The ProcessAnnotatedType container lifecycle event will be called for vetoed types.
